title: 182 - Beyond the Politics of Abortion
description:
This week, Mike begins a conversation on Abortion. In light of recent bills brought forth in New York and Virginia, Mike responds to a question sent in on the topic of Abortion.

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - apple.co/1Lla1Nj

www.patreon.com/voxpodcast

Music in this episode by Timothy John Stafford
www.timothyjohnstafford.com
Instagram & Twitter: @GoneTimothy
